tossup_question: -   –   A lunar eclipse can occur only during what phase of the moon?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Full moon
X) New moon
Y) First quarter
Z) Last quarter
bonus_question: -   –  At what altitude does the greatest variation in daily temperature occur?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Near the ground
X) 10 meters above the ground
Y) 50 meters above the ground
Z) 100 meters above the ground
